page.title: 10HOME LIFE. HOUSEHOLD GADGETS
page.content: More are made every day in millions coffee makers,cookers,watehes gadgets of all sorts.In our block{14%}had calor gas cookers,{70%}had electric cookers,{37.%}had microwaves.Between{ {40}and{50%}of homes have these gad- gets; Liquidsors,electric potato peelers, cake mixers,sodastreams, garbage disposers,fridge and freezers, televisions, washing machines,tumble driers,hoovers, can openers,tape recorders,hair driers. Labour saving devises extend to the garden.Torches{89%}moter mowers{70% strimers{47%}hospipes{89%}spriclas{ {47%}sheds{70%}drils{61%}grinders{14% and sanders {47%}.
